DAB000001_001.name: Human-x-[SNCA_H]-mAb-(anti-alpha-synuclein_NI-202.12F4__mAb_hIgG1/hLambda)-IgG1 / Lambda
DAB000001_001.source: HD-BIOP3 cells were provided by Bo Jiang Kenilworth, Lot# 150171259
DAB000001_001.subcultivationRatio: subculture every 3-4 days with a split ratio 1:4
DAB000001_001.batchNotes: Recovery condition: Suspend cell pellet/vial in 10-15mL medium in shaker flask, without puromycin before 1st passaging
